portfolioitem.title: Webpage Feedback
portfolioitem.problem: I needed a simple way to collect feedback from users on a webpage. I didn't want to use a complex or large library.
portfolioitem.solution: I created a simple feedback collector which took the user input and sent it to a REST endpoint.

additionaltext.p: The code in the repository saves each response in a separate file. The solution is easy to modify so that you could put the results in a database also.
